title: How do I take an old account's name?
body:
I read the FAQ and I'm sorry my English is weak I don't really understand how old the account should be since it becomes available, the account I want has only 3 ranked games in 2014, it's unranked and the guy only played 5 champions that didn't surpass level 2 on any of them.

If that doesn't make it available I don't know what will. But when I go to the name change in the store it says the name is unavailable so what am I missing here?

replies.body: If you are using a third party site to check on names, keep in mind they may not always be accurate or provide complete context of that account.  We're unable to release names manually, but they will become available automatically on their own per the[ Summoner Name Cleanup](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).  Hope that helps clarify some things up!
